channel.title: Hosting
channel.description: Ok guys yeh its kinda a newb question but how do i host a serv so other people can play it? im kinda new to this whole server stuff but i chnaged ip in client and i put client on laptop but wont let me login, lets me login on hosting comp....i made sure no-ip and serv is running....duno wut else i gotta do, help plawks (:

item.title: Hosting
item.dc:creator: @per_askeladden per askeladden
item.description:
@per_askeladden wrote:


Here I help you

Chapter 1 - Getting JDK
Chapter 2 - Downloading and Installing No-Ip
Chapter 3 - Getting a Client
Chapter 4 - Opening 43594 (Default Port) use utorrent
Chapter 5 - Getting a Source
chapter 6 - open the no-ip.com
chapter 7 - open the utorrent make the port:43594
chapter 9 - run the socure
chapter 10 - now pepoles can play

note: when you do no-ip&utorrent it can take long time to get it online,
but keep trying.

Got any more Questions pm me ;D If you didn’t understand what i was talking about so go to this site: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html

there is a guide with pictures

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting
item.dc:creator: @i_str_pk_i i str pk i
item.description:
@i_str_pk_i wrote:

The hoster need use 127.0.0.1 as ip or u wont be able to connect to ur server.

Read full topic
